pullRequest.title: Remove links to Observing Ballerina Page
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Remove links to Observing Ballerina Page. Related to ballerina-platform/ballerina-dev-website#1406

Approach

Remove links to Observing Ballerina Page.

Samples
